name: Canon Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Weaker yen helps to lift Canon profit as camera demand slows

content: TOKYO  Jan 28 Japan's Canon Inc  reported a slight rise in fourth-quarter profit thanks to a weaker yen and solid office equipment sales  although its camera business struggled to attract photographers who are increasingly turning to rivals' compact models.
name: Canon Inc
title: Weaker yen helps lift Canon profit despite poor camera sales

content: * Canon Inc says sees interchangeable lens camera sales in 2015 of 6.4 million units versus 6.36 million in 2014
name: Canon Inc
title: BRIEF-Canon announces unit sales  forex forecasts for 2015

title: TABLE-Canon -2014 parent results

content: TOKYO  Jan 9 Canon Inc and other Japanese electronics companies want to bring production of some goods back home  reversing a years-old trend of overseas manufacturing as a rapid decline in the value of the yen makes local goods more competitive.
name: Canon Inc
title: Weak yen spurs Japan electronics firms to bring production home
